name: American Football: Guns & Balls
description:
• TOP 5 APP AROUND THE WORLD • FEATURED IN NEW AND NOTEWORTHY •

You've NEVER seen a game like this before! Grab your guns and your balls, 'cause this here's American Football! Yeehaw!

• WIN...BY ANY MEANS NECESSARY •
Whether you're launching field goal kicks or blasting your opponent's balls out of the air with your trusty six shooter, it's all fair game here, cowboy!

• COMPETE FOR GLORY •
Win prizes in online tournaments or compete in single player seasons as your favorite team. Then put your winnings to use by unlocking unique guns and balls.

• THE CRITICS ARE GOING WILD •
"The most American thing ever" - Touch Arcade
"Hey ESPN, we would watch this sport all day!" - Free Apps Arcade
"The Quirky App of the Day" - AppAdvice
"Best combo of great things in America! Just need some beer." - Bo Henry
Editor's Choice - Best10Apps.com

• JOIN OVER 50 MILLION GAMERS WORLDWIDE •
And find out why Naquatic apps like Guncrafter and Shooting Showdown have lit up the top charts and been featured by everyone from Apple to IGN, AppAdvice, and TouchArcade.

JAM PACKED WITH FEATURES
• Virtual reality controls let you take aim with your device
• Online multiplayer through GameCenter
• Unlockable and upgradeable guns and balls
• Customize to match your play style
• Online tournaments for huge prizes
• Support for the glorious iPhone 5, iPad Mini, and iPad Retina display
• Game Center leaderboards and achievements
